website_summaries.verdict: Joyride over 50 famous off-road cars through intense dirt tracks around the world alongside friends.
pros: Create millions of mud-caked routes across multiple nations, watch your truck take realistic damage mid-race, and keep coming back to crush the daily, weekly, and monthly challenges
Rally racing doesn’t get more intense than this
cons: May come with a bit of a learning curve for newcomers

customer_reviews.title: Be Fearless (scottish accent added)
customer_reviews.text: Love it, has modes for more hardcore (simulator) and more lay on your couch with a controller (gamer, me). The controller controls are good unlike dirt rally, the wheel controls are phenomenal. The soundtrack is much like dirt 2 and 3, right on codemasters! The ability to create a track pushes this above the rest, you can LITERALLY play forever. I like that the cars handle differently, the AI are challenging(not as hard as dirt rally, even on fearless difficulty). What a good game, this is the true successor to dirt 3. Not that piece of scum dirt showdown. Remember, left 2, dont cut, be FEARLESS

product_meta.title: DiRT 4 - Day One Edition - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:Day OneDirt 4 challenges you to “Be Fearless” by capturing the thrill, emotion and passion of off-road racing. It recreates the heady mix of adrenalin and fear that comes from powering around a blind bend and the rush you feel going for a last ditch overtake when there's not enough room on the final lap of a race. Off-road racing is about more than perfect cornering, it's about heart-pounding, split-section decision making where bravery brings reward.
feature_bullets: Over 50 off-road cars- Including Ford Fiesta R5, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution VI, Subaru WRX STI NR4 and Audi Sport Quattro S1 E2
5 locations with millions of routes - Australia, Spain, Michigan, Sweden & Wales
The Official game of the FIA World Rally cross Championship - Race at "Montalegre, Loheac Bretagne, Hell, Holjes & Lydden Hill" in a multitude of different series
Your Stage - Innovative rally route creation tool that allows you to produce a near infinite number of unique stages at the touch of a button
Next generation of RaceNet - Live ladder, leagues and tournaments, cross-platform leader boards, enhanced CREST telemetry system
